text: Alien TV is a 2020 hybrid animated series produced by Entertainment One and Pop Family Entertainment for Netflix. The series focuses on a television news crew made up of the extraterrestrials Ixbee, Pixbee and Squee, who are sent to learn about the planet Earth. == Cast == * Rob Tinkler as Ixbee * Julie Lemieux as Pixbee * John Cleland as Squee * Kyle Dooley as Squood * Rupert Degas as Translator ==Episodes== == Release == Alien TV was released on 21 August 2020 on Netflix. == References == == Other websites == * * Category:2020 Canadian television series debuts Category:2021 Canadian television series endings Category:Australian television series Category:Canadian television series Category:Comedy television series Category:Children's television series Category:Netflix original series Category:English-language television programs
title: Alien TV
